title: Spectacular 1+1, Central A/C, spacious closets, balcony  and more
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Glenoaks Gardens', 'Glenoaks Gardens are newly renovated to provide comfort and convenience to all.', 'Enjoy our close proximity to the Burbank Airport and downtown Burbank, as well as the quiet tranquility of Sun Valley.', 'Our apartments come equipped with large closets, designer paint, plenty of cabinet space and beautiful mountain views.', 'Take a tour today and see why Glenoaks Garden Apartments are the perfect home for you!', 'Now offering Virtual and Self guide tours', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 750 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Dishwasher', '- Central Air and Heat', '- Spacious Closets', '- Quartz counter tops', '- Stove', '- Designer Paint', '- Balconies*', '- Refrigerator', '- Lots of Cabinet space', 'Community Amenities', '- Elevators', '- Swimming Pool', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Spa', '- Gated Community', '- Fitness Center', '- Assigned and Gated Parking', '- BBQ', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Income Requirements:', 'Must make 2.5 time the monthly rent.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:10:00AM-4:30PM', 'Tuesday-Thursday:8:30AM-4:30PM', 'Friday:9:00AM-4:00PM', 'Glenoaks Gardens', '8601 Glenoaks Blvd., Sun Valley, CA, 91352', 'kA8YRO0lo']
